headline: Assessing Keurig Dr Pepper’s Valuation After Recent Share Price Rebound in 2025
summary: Wondering if Keurig Dr Pepper at around $29.47 is quietly turning into a value opportunity, or if it is a stock to avoid for now? This breakdown is for you. After drifting lower for much of the year, the share price has bounced, up 3.1% over the last week and 10.3% over the last month, even though it is still down 7.2% year to date and 10.2% over the last year. Some of this shift in sentiment has come as investors refocus on the company’s steady cash generation, ongoing innovation in its...
